ygData.subject: RE: FLOWING BLACK SILK SASH TEST
ygData.msgSnippet: don t i wish i could.  that frickin mob is rare enough, and him dropping the sash is equally rare. good tests though, great info.  and thanks for the extreme
ygData.messageBody:
don't i wish i could. that frickin mob is rare enough, and him dropping the
sash is equally rare.

good tests though, great info. and thanks for the extreme pang of jealousy
you gave me =P at least i got the same weapons as you hehe, sans sash.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 22 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server


> Get a Sash when you can. They are
> great
> stuff.
>
> (I also tested to see if the sash speeded up song pulses ut
> the results
> indicate that the Sash does not speed our songs. I recieved
> 10 messages in
> 60 seconds with heal and with anthem regardless if I had the
> sash on or
> off).
>
> Note I have not tested with a slower weapon like the Runed
> Falchion. Also
> note that a weapons Speed Rating is equivalent the the tenths
> of seconds in
> Between swings it seems.
>
>
> Thanks
> RADIA
> Cazic-Thule Server
>
